22  enum Permission : int {
23  CREATE_INSTANT_INVITE = 0x00000001,
24  KICK_MEMBERS = 0x00000002,
25  BAN_MEMBERS = 0x00000004,
26  ADMINISTRATOR = 0x00000008,
27  MANAGE_CHANNELS = 0x00000010,
28  MANAGE_GUILD = 0x00000020,
29  ADD_REACTIONS = 0x00000040,
30  VIEW_AUDIT_LOG = 0x00000080,
31  READ_MESSAGES = 0x00000400,
32  SEND_MESSAGES = 0x00000800,
33  SEND_TTS_MESSAGES = 0x00001000,
34  MANAGE_MESSAGES = 0x00002000,
35  EMBED_LINKS = 0x00004000,
36  ATTACH_FILES = 0x00008000,
37  READ_MESSAGE_HISTORY = 0x00010000,
38  MENTION_EVERYONE_HERE_ALL_ROLES = 0x00020000,
39  USE_EXTERNAL_EMOJIS = 0x00040000,
40  CONNECT = 0x00100000,
41  SPEAK = 0x00200000,
42  MUTE_MEMBERS = 0x00400000,
43  DEAFEN_MEMBERS = 0x00800000,
44  MOVE_MEMBERS = 0x01000000,
45  USE_VAD = 0x02000000,
46  PRIORITY_SPEAKER = 0x00000100,
47  STREAM = 0x00000200,
48  CHANGE_NICKNAME = 0x04000000,
49  MANAGE_NICKNAMES = 0x08000000,
50  MANAGE_ROLES = 0x10000000,
51  MANAGE_WEBHOOKS = 0x20000000,
52  MANAGE_EMOJIS = 0x40000000,
53  };

55  inline std::string PermissionToString(Permission perm) {
56  std::unordered_map<Permission, std::string> permission_str_map = {
57  {Permission::CREATE_INSTANT_INVITE, "CREATE_INSTANT_INVITE"},
58  {Permission::KICK_MEMBERS, "KICK_MEMBERS"},
59  {Permission::BAN_MEMBERS, "BAN_MEMBERS"},
60  {Permission::ADMINISTRATOR, "ADMINISTRATOR"},
61  {Permission::MANAGE_CHANNELS, "MANAGE_CHANNELS"},
62  {Permission::MANAGE_GUILD, "MANAGE_GUILD"},
63  {Permission::ADD_REACTIONS, "ADD_REACTIONS"},
64  {Permission::VIEW_AUDIT_LOG, "VIEW_AUDIT_LOG"},
65  {Permission::READ_MESSAGES, "READ_MESSAGES"},
66  {Permission::SEND_MESSAGES, "SEND_MESSAGES"},
67  {Permission::SEND_TTS_MESSAGES, "SEND_TTS_MESSAGES"},
68  {Permission::MANAGE_MESSAGES, "MANAGE_MESSAGES"},
69  {Permission::EMBED_LINKS, "EMBED_LINKS"},
70  {Permission::ATTACH_FILES, "ATTACH_FILES"},
71  {Permission::READ_MESSAGE_HISTORY, "READ_MESSAGE_HISTORY"},
72  {Permission::MENTION_EVERYONE_HERE_ALL_ROLES, "MENTION_EVERYONE_HERE_ALL_ROLES"},
73  {Permission::USE_EXTERNAL_EMOJIS, "USE_EXTERNAL_EMOJIS"},
74  {Permission::CONNECT, "CONNECT"},
75  {Permission::SPEAK, "SPEAK"},
76  {Permission::MUTE_MEMBERS, "MUTE_MEMBERS"},
77  {Permission::DEAFEN_MEMBERS, "DEAFEN_MEMBERS"},
78  {Permission::MOVE_MEMBERS, "MOVE_MEMBERS"},
79  {Permission::USE_VAD, "USE_VAD"},
80  {Permission::PRIORITY_SPEAKER, "PRIORITY_SPEAKER"},
81  {Permission::STREAM, "STREAM"},
82  {Permission::CHANGE_NICKNAME, "CHANGE_NICKNAME"},
83  {Permission::MANAGE_NICKNAMES, "MANAGE_NICKNAMES"},
84  {Permission::MANAGE_ROLES, "MANAGE_ROLES"},
85  {Permission::MANAGE_WEBHOOKS, "MANAGE_WEBHOOKS"},
86  {Permission::MANAGE_EMOJIS, "MANAGE_EMOJIS"}
87  };
88  return permission_str_map[perm];
89  }

137  class NoPermissionException : public std::runtime_error {
138  public:
139  explicit NoPermissionException(const Permission& req_perm) : std::runtime_error("Required permission " + PermissionToString(req_perm) + " not met.") {}
140  explicit NoPermissionException(const std::string& str) : std::runtime_error(str) {}
141  };
